store.title: The application store
store.description: The application store which manages the applications. Vendor IDs are store specific.

storeInfo.title: The application store info
storeInfo.description: The info about an application store.

storeId.title: The store id
storeId.description: The store id of the store which uniquely identifies an application store.

endpoint.title: The endpoint of the application store
endpoint.description: The endpoint of the REST resources of the application store.

applicationId.title: The application id
applicationId.description: The application id which uniquely identifies an application.

vendorId.title: The vendor id
vendorId.description: The vendor id of the store which uniquely identifies a vendor in the store.

vendorApplicationId.title: The vendor application id
vendorApplicationId.description: The vendor specific application id which uniquely identifies an application of the vendor.
